page.title: 04PORTPATRICK-H.M.COASTGUARD
page.content: Portpatrick has{one full-time {Coastguard Officer}and{15 volunteer {Auxiliaries}who form a{Cliff Rescue {Party.Three}of the team assist in manning the{Mobile Patrol Vehicle,} which covers the coastline from{ {PortWilliam}in the east to{Bennane {Head}at{Ballantrae,}in{Ayrshire}to the north and is in constant{radio contact with{Coastguard Stations}in{Scotland, {Ireland}and the{Isle of Man.} The unit is justly proud of holding,for a second year,{the George {Karren Memorial Shield,}the trophy for the{fastest cliff-rescue party}in a { {breeches-buoy jackstay competition,} involving teams from the{Isle of Man} and the{south-west of Scotland.
